title: ResolveStart
contents:
API > @angular/router
mode_edit code

ResolveStartlink

在路由的“解析”阶段开始时触发的事件。

An event triggered at the start of the Resolve phase of routing.

查看"说明"...

class ResolveStart extends RouterEvent { constructor(id: number, url: string, urlAfterRedirects: string, state: RouterStateSnapshot) urlAfterRedirects: string state: RouterStateSnapshot toString(): string // 继承自 router/RouterEvent constructor(id: number, url: string) id: number url: string }

参见link

  • ResolveEnd

说明link

表示路由解析（Resolve）阶段的开始。该事件的触发时机将来可能会改变，因为它是试验性的。 在当前的迭代中，它将会在 resolve 阶段执行，而不管有没有东西要 resolve。 将来，这种行为可能会修改成只有当有东西要 resolve 时才执行。

Runs in the "resolve" phase whether or not there is anything to resolve. In future, may change to only run when there are things to be resolved.

构造函数link

constructor(id: number, url: string, urlAfterRedirects: string, state: RouterStateSnapshot)
参数
id number
url string
urlAfterRedirects string
state RouterStateSnapshot
